DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from the following Sophos (Astaro) Security Gateways: 110, 120, 220, 320, 425, 525, 625.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) (\S+) \S+ (\S+)\[\d+\]: \w+ id="(\d+)" severity="(\w+)" sys="([^"]*)" sub="[^"]*" name="[^"]*" event_type="SAV" effect="Access has been blocked to "([^"]*)" as '([^']*)' has been found at this website." action="(\w+)" type="(\w+)".*
FastPattern.pattern: epsecd\[\d+\]: \w+ id="4225" severity="\w+" sys="[^"]*" sub="[^"]*" name="Handled SAV event" event_type="SAV" effect="Access has been blocked to "[^"]*" as '[^']*' has been found at this website." action="\w+" type="webFiltering"

FastPattern.description: HTTPClientAccess: snort - id=2101 - EXPLOIT Internet Explorer DOM
FastPattern.pattern: snort.*id="2101".*reason="EXPLOIT Internet Explorer DOM mergeAttributes memory corruption attempt"

FastPattern.pattern: snort.*id="2101".*reason="BROWSER-IE Microsoft Internet Explorer(?: 7 emulation via meta tag| CSS style memory corruption attempt)"

FastPattern.description: SoftwareUpdate: auisys - New Pattern Up2Dates installed
SoftwareUpdate: auisys - Searching for available up2date packages
FastPattern.pattern: auisys\[\d+\]: Searching for available up2date packages for type
auisys\[\d+\]: Starting (?:Up2Date Package Installer|up2date package installation)

FastFormatter.description: get status from - changed state to

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning: audid - All Authentication Servers failed
ServiceWarning: audid - Could not conect to Authentication Server
FastPattern.pattern: audld\[\d+\]: Could not connect to Authentication Server [\d.]+:\d+ \(code=\d+ .+?\)

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning: epsecd - 4209, warn, Computer is not compliant
FastPattern.pattern: epsecd\[\d+\]: W id="4209" severity="warn" sys="[^"]*" sub="[^"]*" name="Computer is not compliant"

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: epsecd - 4210, info, Sleeping for \d+ seconds
ServiceInfo: epsecd - 4211, info, Recieved report from Sophos LiveConnect
FastPattern.pattern: epsecd\[\d*\]: I id="4211".*?name="Rec[ei][ie]ved report[()\w]* from Sophos LiveConnect"

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: epsecd - 4223, info, Closing socket to Sophos LiveConnect
FastPattern.pattern: epsecd\[\d*\]: I id="4223".*?name="Closing socket to Sophos LiveConnect"

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: epsecd - 424200, info, Not syncing web policy resources as web control is disabled
FastPattern.pattern: epsecd\[\d+\]: I id="424200" severity="info" sys="[^"]*" sub="[^"]*" name="Not syncing web policy resources as web control is disabled"

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: audld - Starting Up2Date Package Downloader
ServiceInfo: cssd - Reloading SAVI threat data
FastPattern.pattern: cssd\[\d+\]: \[.*?\] saviscanner_log \(\w+\.c:\d+\) Reloading SAVI threat data
exim-in\[\d+\]: [-\d]+ [:\d]+ pid \d+: SIGHUP received: re-exec daemon
middleware\[\d+\]:.* ending cycle \d+, caught \d+ signals, \d+ children still running
smtpd\[\d+\]: \w+\[\d+\]: QR globally (?:dis|en)abled, status \w+ set to '[^']+'
syslog-ng\[\d+\]: Syslog connection established; fd='\d+', server='[^']+', local='[^']+'

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: auisys - {running HA master, Doing HA sync, running on HA slave}
FastPattern.pattern: auisys\[\d+\]: (?:running on HA (?:slave|master) system|Doing HA sync)

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: auisys - {removing, parsing installation instructions, calling}

FastPattern.pattern: auisys\[\d+\]: No suitable packages of type

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: auisys - {Setting required_version, running on slave/cluster node, Up2Date Package Installer finished, no HA system or cluster node, waiting for db_verify to return}
FastPattern.pattern: auisys\[\d+\]: (?:This is a patch. Setting required_version|running on slave/cluster node|Up2Date Package Installer finished|no HA system or cluster node|waiting for db_verify to return)

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning: ulogd - pg1: ERROR: integer out of range
FastPattern.pattern: ulogd\[\d+\]: pg1: ERROR: integer out of range

FastPattern.description: NullAlert: weed - cache size after cleanup
